@davidmascharka From source without "conda install -c soumith magma-cuda80 # or magma-cuda75 if CUDA 7.5"? Which python version?
Edit: I just retried with Ubuntu 16.04, CUDA 9, cuDNN 7 and 9ef39a5 on python 3.6. Build from source with anaconda without "conda install -c soumith magma-cuda80 # or magma-cuda75 if CUDA 7.5" and I still get 100% GPU utilization shown by nvidia-smi, but the program just gets stuck! I tried a fresh install of Ubuntu 16.04 and 17.04
